todos.title: Constraints of Method
todos.body: We are forced to do something a certain way.

todos.title: Transformer
todos.body: Uses constraint as an opportunity and increases ambition.

todos.title: Marketing
todos.body: Use drama, surprise, humor, storytelling, exaggerations, bad news, good news, be interesting and don’t be afraid to be mildly offensive.

todos.title: Surprise Marketing
todos.body: Unexpected gains or gifts will amplify positive emotions and bring on greater pleasure.

todos.title: Celebrated Maxim
todos.body: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world, the unreasonable man adapts the world to himself.

todos.title: Constraints of Resource
todos.body: Restricts output because of a limited input.

todos.title: Clickers
todos.body: Remote control devices used to discretely poll audience or take attendance.

todos.title: Neutralizer
todos.body: Refuses to lower ambition but finds a different way.

todos.title: Victim
todos.body: Lowers ambition when faced with a constraint.

todos.title: Don’t reinvent the wheel
todos.body: Look elsewhere for answers to your problems.

todos.title: Constraints of Foundation
todos.body: Limiting fundamental element of success.

todos.title: Constraints of Time
todos.body: Limited time to do something.

todos.title: Patience (And Consistent Product Period)
todos.body: Intel found the right amount of time (like 9 month pregnancy) that it takes to fully develop their product).  Something’s just take a certain amount of time no matter how smart or efficient you are.

todos.title: Artificial Constraint
todos.body: Imposing an artificial constraint to see if the group can come up with a solution.

todos.title: Alliances
todos.body: Form mutually beneficial alliances.

todos.title: Kludging
todos.body: Finding a quick and dirty solution cause you have no other object.

todos.title: Twofer
todos.body: Each industry, company, product, process usually has two very strong variables that if met will determine its success.  Learn what those two variables are and put all your resources in them.

todos.title: Ives Motto
todos.body: Design takes a remarkable focus and being inquisitive and optimistic.

todos.title: Propelling Question
todos.body: Audi asked there engineers “how can we win Le Mans if our car can go no faster than other cars”.  The responded by creating the first diesel racer that won three years because it had to make fewer pit stops.

todos.title: Four Sources of Unreasonableness
todos.body: As the world changes, regulators, consumer, customer, challenger/disruptors expectations grow and they no longer accept the trade-offs that they once did.  People know want the new “all” as in “I want it all.”

todos.title: Can-Ifs
todos.body: 1. We can if we think of x as y…, 2. We can if we use other people to…, 3. We can if we remove x to allow us to…, 4. We can if we access knowledge of (or if everyone contributes to)…, 5. We can if we introduce a…, 6 We can if we substitute x for y… 7.  We can if we fund it by…, 8.  We can if we mix together things that haven’t been mixed… 9.  We can if we resource it by…

todos.title: Potential Resources
todos.body: 1. Untapped stakeholders, 2. External Partners, 3. Resource Owners, 4. Competition.

todos.title: Sales Trigger
todos.body: Your sales process should trigger an emotional and mental response or association in the buyer.

todos.title: Respect Constraints
todos.body: When a brand stops respecting its constraints and tries to become something it is not it becomes weaker.  Constraints lead to focus and simplicity.

todos.title: Past Success (Ruts)
todos.body: What creates success in the past can become the thing that limits you from success in the future.

todos.title: Fuel
todos.body: We need constraints to fuel passion and insight.  Unconstrained teams usually have more conflict because the create constraints in their head to fill the void.  Constraints make it easier to solve a problem.

todos.title: Deep Listening
todos.body: Truly listening to underlying problem.  May include shadowing person.

todos.title: Resource Curse
todos.body: Things that are rich in natural resources can often perform worse than things with constraints.

todos.title: Can-If
todos.body: Stop people from saying “we can’t because” and have them start saying “we can if”.

todos.title: Leader at Each Table
todos.body: Split into small groups of 4-6 and have a leader at each table.

todos.title: Moore’s Law
todos.body: Some would say that Moore’s law came into the highlight because of Intel’s 18 month planning stage.

todos.title: Abundance
todos.body: Scarcity is an opportunity to access abundance elsewhere.

todos.title: Mock Up
todos.body: Mock up covers of magazines or newspapers illustrating what it would read if you achieved your goals and it made front page (“Most Innovative Company in World!”).

todos.title: Little is Big
todos.body: Little inventions lead to big inventions.

todos.title: Dwelling
todos.body: Going back and forth between optimism and pessimism can be an incredibly motivating force to motivate change.

todos.title: Power of Three
todos.body: Explore at least three options.

todos.title: Amazing v. Better Than
todos.body: Don’t focus on your competition, focus on being the best.

todos.title: Children
todos.body: Children raised on excessive possessions and praise, given every opportunity, protected from failure, can fail to develop a true sense of self and will have anxiety because there are too many decisions.

todos.title: Legitimacy
todos.body: By giving examples of companies that have taken constraints and turned them into opportunities, you create legitimacy and buy-in.  Taiwan having no natural resources so it utilizes human resources, Southwest Airlines going from 4 to 3 planes and invents no assigned seat boarding process to increase turnover, Africans painting chickens blue so they won’t get eaten by eagles.

todos.title: 10x
todos.body: Be ten times better than anything else out there.

todos.title: Step Up
todos.body: Asking someone to step up and take responsibility to make something happen.

todos.title: Priming
todos.body: Ask everyone for an example of how they had been able to take a constraint in the past and turn it into an opportunity.

todos.title: Beautiful Constraint
todos.body: Ask “how can we make this constraint beautiful.”  Crowd source ideas for constraints.

todos.title: Grit
todos.body: Ability to maintain commitment despite the obstacles.

todos.title: Weakest Link
todos.body: A constraint that is most limiting.
